# Webinars

## Quick Start

This skill helps you run webinars that generate leads. For complete frameworks, see the [Complete Guide](references/guide.md).

## Execution Checklist

### Running a Webinar

- [ ] Choose topic (pain point + solution)
- [ ] Create landing page (registration form)
- [ ] Promote (email, ads, social, partners)
- [ ] Prepare slides (75% education, 25% pitch)
- [ ] Send reminder emails (1 week, 1 day, 1 hour before)
- [ ] Run webinar (45min content + 15min Q&A)
- [ ] Follow up within 24 hours
- [ ] Share recording and replay page
- [ ] Repurpose into content

## Key Frameworks

- **Webinar Structure**: Hook (5 min) → Problem (10 min) → Framework (20 min) → Solution/Demo (10 min) → Q&A (15 min)
- **Promotion Timeline**: 2-3 weeks pre-webinar
- **Attendance Rate**: 30-40% of registrants
- **Conversion Rate**: 5-15% of attendees

## Quick Wins

- Partner with complementary company (share audiences)
- Use polls during webinar (increase engagement)
- Offer early-bird bonus (increase show-up rate)
- Send replay to no-shows (convert later)
